Pre-Game Insights: The Kings are coming into the game on a 4-game winning streak.
The Kings are 9-12 on their home court and 9-6 in games decided by at least 10 points.
The Heat are 7-9 on the road and 9-6 in games decided by at least 10 points.
The Kings are shooting 47.7% from the field this season, 1.2 percentage points higher than the 46.5% the Heat allow to opponents.
The Heat average 14.1 made 3-pointers per game this season, 0.5 fewer makes per game than the Kings give up.
